vocabulary.definition: a cardinal number represented in the U.S. by 1 followed by 18 zeros, and in Great Britain by 1 followed by 30 zeros
vocabulary.example: To power Tokyo, you would need a quintillion glowing jellies.

vocabulary.definition: the electric charge that accumulates in certain solid materials in response to applied mechanical stress
vocabulary.example: We can extract energy from jellyfish using the power of piezoelectricity.
We will create a ginormous battery from jellyfish to power Tokyo.

vocabulary.definition: involving or causing sudden great damage or suffering
vocabulary.example: Banana rain would have a catastrophic impact on cities and infrastructure.

vocabulary.definition: complete final destruction of the world
vocabulary.example: Banana rain could lead to an apocalypse-level catastrophe.

vocabulary.definition: intending or intended to do harm
vocabulary.example: NordVPN blocks malicious websites to protect users from harmful content.
